handleException

void handleException(java.lang.Exception e)
Called when an internal exception has occurred - for debugging/logging purposes

Parameters:
e - the exception

log

void log(java.lang.String s,
         java.lang.Throwable e,
         boolean newline)
Called when a loggable event occurs

Parameters:
s - the message
e - an optional exception (may be null)
newline - if true, add a newline to the message, otherwise more messages are on the way

getDBExtension

java.lang.String getDBExtension()
Return the value to use for the DB file extension (e.g. ".db")

Returns:
extension

getIndexExtension

java.lang.String getIndexExtension()
Return the value to use for the index file extension (e.g. ".idx")

Returns:
extension

doChunking

boolean doChunking()
Return true if CCDB2 should chunk objects - otherwise objects use a single byte array

Returns:
true/false

callRemoveObject

void callRemoveObject(java.lang.String key)
Called when an object is being force deleted. If you have multiple DBs with overlapping objects, delete the object from all DBs. Otherwise just call CCDB2Instance.remove(String).

Parameters:
key - the key of the object being removed

getAllocationChunkSize

long getAllocationChunkSize()
Return the file chunk size to use or 0 to use the default (16MB).

Returns:
allocation size or 0
